item.title: REALLY SIMPLE PROBLEME (help)
item.dc:creator: @mrtube mrtube
item.description:
@mrtube wrote:

sendQuest("@dre@zumiez menu", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dbl@type ::home to get back to training", 8145); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@mod jordan is the owner@dbl@", 8147); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@More commands will be coming soon", 8148); sendQuest("@cya@if you got 99 stat click on customer at starting point", 8149); sendQuest("@blu@pk anywere wildy is fairgame", 8150); sendQuest("@blu@ barrows type ::gotobarrows", 8151); sendQuest("@blu@ to get there! for help type ::barrowshelp", 8152);

okay thats the code now to change the text do this .

               sendQuest("@dbl@type ::home to get back to training", 8145);

this @dbl@ means the color of the text and i think its dark blue? to edit the text ( for example to say ::home to get back to runescape )

you would put this

               sendQuest("@dbl@type ::home to get back to runescape", 8145);

this probs doesnt make sense but i try

Read full topic

item.title: REALLY SIMPLE PROBLEME (help)
item.dc:creator: @mrtube mrtube
item.description:
@mrtube wrote:

press ctrl + f

and search the text that you want to edit when you find it then edit it to what you say ( edit the the text int he " do not delete the " )

save compile then run ( make sure your editing the correct thing?

Read full topic

item.title: REALLY SIMPLE PROBLEME (help)
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

In your client.java, use ctrl + f, to find the name of the server source you downloaded, and change the name ONLY within the quote marks ("::home to go back to training"), otherwise the compiler will tell you about errors.

Read full topic

item.title: REALLY SIMPLE PROBLEME (help)

item.description:
@system wrote:

easy go into client.java a search for

 ::home

and change the ::home to go back to training or you can add more text under the home thing
